title: Frustrated Incorporated
content: [{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"Dealing with a lot of frustration.  "}]},{"type":"p","id":"747e26e5-df97-49ac-a0ff-cde953aeef26","children":[{"text":""}]},{"type":"p","id":"5fa28691-2c7e-46b8-bf27-cdab8559c947","children":[{"text":"The lead developer here at PenX is a great guy, and has a much greater vision than the dev teams of even the largest decentralized blogging platforms.  This isn't hyperbolic.  Not even a little.  "}]},{"type":"p","id":"b09832a8-1e1e-47a4-99db-9f507ced4b41","children":[{"text":""}]},{"type":"p","id":"1e8a16f9-dece-4a8a-b120-94ed5119e285","children":[{"text":"I've been doing what is basically alpha testing for PenX for the last week or so, and will continue to do so.  With such a small team, this early in development, errors and such are to be expected.  "}]},{"type":"p","id":"a1616e43-202f-433c-bfe3-60dd38759051","children":[{"text":""}]},{"type":"p","id":"bc312225-8e4d-4529-9846-7b03393bdd80","children":[{"text":"I most commonly encounter errors at attempts to use features that are, well, sorta of blog adjacent.  The photo gallery and database things, for instance.  So, I do spend a lot of time talking with the developers, reporting errors, things that I think could be arranged in a better way, and so forth.  "}]},{"type":"h2","id":"3dce6608-8c47-4cca-8933-b3838d890ffe","children":[{"text":"The good news is that he is quite fast in his efforts to remedy these maladies.  "}]},{"children":[{"text":""}],"type":"p","id":"e8df344c-7106-4b5a-8fcd-6889dc4f98b1"},{"children":[{"text":"I'm dealing with a great deal of frustration with other areas  of my life, so all of these combine to make "},{"text":"BIG","italic":true},{"text":" feelings.  I am learning to cope."}],"type":"p","id":"cee1eae0-3e36-44d7-a973-7fe513f71794"},{"type":"p","id":"e27dcdbc-2810-4d30-882e-0e847f7167f4","children":[{"text":""}]},{"type":"p","id":"c70ca241-16fc-4944-8e19-29ddeda4dd21","children":[{"text":"Jack Lhasa"}],"indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc"},{"type":"p","id":"7b70cd04-f3a6-47ba-82be-ac9d35ec5381","indent":1,"listStyleType":"disc","children":[{"text":""},{"children":[{"text":"Exoteric"}],"type":"a","url":"https://exoteric.live/","id":"6414a6bc-36d9-462a-9682-1380fda832fd"},{"text":""}],"listStart":2},{"type":"p","id":"09250394-389f-4378-95bd-0b0011d24489","children":[{"text":""}]},{"type":"p","id":"f3bd126b-354d-44ae-ad44-5b3f6da5119f","children":[{"text":""}]}]
